page.title: 10Local Farming
page.content: In our block there are 17 farms.{ {Barns Farm}is derelict and it is mostly knocked down now.But when people lived there they had thirteen children. The land is mostly arable but there is rough grazing along Kingstone Brook because it is too wet for intensive farming.There is some grassland which is baled and silaged. The biggest farm is{Glebe Farm}on Wysall Lane. The main crops are{ {wheat,barley,oilseed,rape}and{linseed} which is an experimental crop. There are 2{agricultural contractors, one on Rempstone Hill and one in Rempstone Village. The general{livestock}are{dairy {herds,pigs}and some{sheep.}Some{ {poultry}are also kept.
